tool_description:
IDfy’s Philippines Driving License OCR API allows you to onboard your customers with speed and precision.

Enable them to prefill their onboarding forms instantly, by just uploading or scanning a Driving License – IDfy will digitize the document for you!
name: Philippines Driving License OCR
